title: Top Places to visit in Balasore (Baleshwar), Odisha
content: Balasore or Baleshwar is a city in the state of Odisha, about 194 kilometres (121 mi) north of the state capital Bhubaneswar, in eastern India. It is the administrative headquarters of Balasore district. It is best known for Chandipur beach. The Indian Ballistic Missile Defense Program's Integrat

title: Top Places to visit in Bargarh (Baragarh), Odisha
content:
Bargarh is a municipality in Bargarh district in the state of Odisha, India. It is the administrative headquarters of Bargarh District . Popularly known for rice cultivation (parboiled-rice) therefore called "Bhata Handi" of Odisha State.

title: Top Places to visit in Balangir, Odisha
content: Balangir is a city and municipality, the headquarters of Balangir district in the state of Odisha, India. Balangir has a rich cultural heritage. It is also known as the cultural hub of Western Odisha. Balangir municipality is divided into twenty one wards. It is spread over an area of 12,200 acre

title: Top Places to visit in Bhadrak, Odisha
content: Bhadrak is a city of Odisha state in eastern India. It came into existence on 1 April 1993. The city is the district headquarters of Bhadrak district. According to legend, the city derives its name from the Goddess Bhadrakali, whose temple is on the banks of the Salandi River.

title: Top Places to visit in Boudh (Bauda), Odisha
content:
Boudh District is an administrative and a municipal district, one of the thirty in the Odisha, India. The district headquarters of the Boudh District is the city of Boudh.

title: Top Places to visit in Angul, Odisha
content:
Angul is a town and a municipality and the headquarters of Angul district in the state of Odisha, India.
Angul District is an administrative and municipal district, one of the thirty in Odisha, India. The city of Angul is Angul district's headquarters.
